document_data.name: Talieth
document_data.mainbody: '''Talieth''' was the Lady of Sentinelspire, the daughter of [[Alaodin]].{{cite book/Sentinelspire||15}}
document_data.Description: Talieth had flawless, smooth, dark skin, black eyes, and black hair she kept in braids to her waist.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||15}}
